meanings.definition: The tube that carries urine from the bladder to outside the body.
meanings.sent1: The urethras in the male body are longer than in females.
meanings.sent2: Doctors can sometimes insert a catheter into the urethras to help drain the bladder.
meanings.sent3: The party trickster pretended to have multiple urethras after drinking too much water.
meanings.sent4: The network of underground pipes resembled a complex system of urethras carrying liquid to different areas.
meanings.sent5: In the anatomy class, the teacher used a model to demonstrate the function of urethras in the human body.
